resources.string: Keeping your distance to stay safe.
Alert when someone getting too close
For identification only, no SMS confirmation
Please enable bluetooth in settings and restart this application.
Sorry, this device does not support Bluetooth LE.
Your phone number is too short

MellMet close contact number is the man-day per week. It means the same person can be count twice if you get close in 2 days in a week to provide data anonymity and still provide a meaningful number. This guide does not conform to any standard.
Little or no risk, stay at home is still recommended.
Medium contact, should avoid close contact and wear a mask in work or public place.
Increased likelihood of exposure, should wear a mask all the time. Seek a doctor when found yourself any symptom.
The highest chance of exposure should wear a respirator mask when close contact with others. An examination is highly recommended.
